Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Goatee \Goat`ee"\, n. A part of a man's beard on the chin or lower lip which is allowed to grow, and trimmed so as to resemble the beard of a goat. [1913 Webster]
goatee n : a small chin beard trimmed to a point; named for its resemblance to a goat's beard
